# uptimekuma_notification_twilio (Resource)

Twilio notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_twilio" "example" {
  name        = "Twilio SMS Notifications"
  account_sid = "ACxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
  auth_token  = "your-auth-token"
  to_number   = "+12025550123"
  from_number = "+12025550456"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_twilio" "with_api_key" {
  name        = "Twilio with API Key"
  account_sid = "ACxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"
  api_key     = "your-api-key"
  auth_token  = "your-auth-token"
  to_number   = "+12025550123"
  from_number = "+12025550456"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_sid` (String, Sensitive) Twilio account SID
- `auth_token` (String, Sensitive) Twilio auth token
- `from_number` (String) Twilio sender phone number
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `to_number` (String) Twilio recipient phone number

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Twilio API key
- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
